course.subject: BMED
course.name: Special Project: Global Health Technology II
course.description: This is a “real world” innovation development project addressing the global health issues under low-resource settings. The goal of this course is to develop students’ communication, interpersonal, teamwork, analytical, design and project management skills through a team-based design experience. Students are supervised by a faculty member while having access to different expertise across campus to generate technology prototypes and develop implementation plans. Instructor’s approval is required for enrollment in the course. May be graded PP.
